website_summaries.verdict: An attractive dress belt that allows you to get the perfect fit.
pros: Ratchet buckle on this belt allows you to adjust the length of the belt where you need it rather than with pre-set holes
cons: The latching mechanism can be difficult to get used to

customer_reviews.title: If you are looking for a belt that holds well - this is it.
customer_reviews.text: These are great belts. They don't give like a lot of belts. The quality was better than expected. These are really well made. On the downside, it will take you a little bit to get used to latching mechanism. There is a little trick to it. Push the belt just a hair tighter to ease the pressure on the latch and the belt opens easily. However, the first time I tried I couldn't do it. I absolutely love these belts and I have bought several. I have several different brands and I like this brand the best.
customer_reviews.author: S Smith MD

customer_reviews.title: Very high quality. Very easy to set up and use. Very clean design when wearing
customer_reviews.text: These are unique and beautiful men's leather belts. A very unique system of cutting to the desired and correct length yourself, which could not be easier, and a very creative system to make each belt the perfect fit to each individual body. No holes. Very clean design. Incredible leather belts of very high quality, and very easy to release by pushing a cancelled spot on the inside top of each buckle. I bought 4 different belts from this maker. And each one is extraordinary quality, construction and ease of use. Best men's belts I've ever owned! Would definitely buy again if I need another, or more belts in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Zon is the place!Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Leather is Terrible - Trash Product
customer_reviews.text: I've owned this belt for about 10 months. One day upon taking it off, the belt literally ripped in two. The leather is made up of two incredibly thin strips of leather sewn atop of piece of paper. There is absolutely no reason that a belt should snap in half. I've never owned a belt that broke, especially not even a year after the fact. Warranty is only 180 days.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Great Belt
customer_reviews.text: It is easy to adjust, it's a very fashionable belt, it holds my pants up very comfortably. People keep hitting on me nonstop just because of this belt, the ladies love my belt, the men love my belt. I feel like I'm in a fashion show everywhere I go. People whistle, howl, wink, and even slap my backside, but I don't mind. This belt completes me.You want me in this belt. You need me in this belt. If this belt isn't around my waist it's around my ankles, and you know that there is a party happening somewhere.
customer_reviews.author: BlackHawk Benny!!!

customer_reviews.title: Belt appears just fine, but not for me.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a Cordovan colored belt, and though it looked like Cordovan on the screen, it wasn't in person. Bummer. The OTHER REASON FOR MY RETURN, the so called buckle. It does not appear shiny on the screen, but in real life, it is very shiny. My issue with any of the shiny buckles is they SCRATCH FAST, and you can NOT polish that scratch away. Amazon took it back right away, and I did find another belt by this seller, and the ratchet belt is NOT going to scratch.
customer_reviews.author: This Time I Mean It...

customer_reviews.title: It's Okay.
customer_reviews.text: I've only had this belt a few days. I gave it 3 stars because I have a hard time getting the catch to release. On day one I had to visit the bathroom for some serious business. I could not get the belt catch to release even after reading the directions which say to push the button. Thankfully, I was still able to pull my pants down. Not sure why the catch on my buckle is difficult to release. Other wise I like the belt quality and size.
customer_reviews.author: Shastastan

customer_reviews.title: Well made dress belt with great ratchet feature for universal sizing.
customer_reviews.text: I really like the ratchet belts and this is my third one. I bought this because the color which I really like. The craftsmanship is really good. Nice stitching, expensive styling, rich leather. The ratchet release mechanism can be a little temperamental sometimes and I have to jiggle it a bit to get the ratchet to click in to hold the belt. Release works fine. It came with instructions to shorten the belt if needed (which I did and was easy). Overall, I really like this belt and would buy another.
customer_reviews.author: DHN

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, good prices, great customer service
customer_reviews.text: This and my other purchase are the 2nd & 3rd ratchet belt/buckle combos I've bought from this company. They are quality -- product, selling process, customer service. The belt feels just right and the ratchet mechanism works easily. Ever since I bought my 1st Marino ratchet belt, these are all I wear. Ever need to slightly adjust your belt but don't want to be obvious doing it? These belts are just great. Easiest belt adjusting ever. If you've never tried one, these are the ratchet belts to start with and you'll stay with them as well.
customer_reviews.author: Texas boy

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: The faux leather (it is NOT leather) looks nice, the buckle shiny and beautiful, the combination lightweight, as opposed to other ratchet belts. What stops me from giving 5 stars is the faux piece that makes it look like a regular belt (like it is sticking it in a hole\). First, who needs it to look like a regular belt when this is far superior? Wear it, flaunt it, and if you are the manufacturer, advertise it. Second, that piece puts little dents in the leather. No one wants that. Give me a square, stainless buckle without that piece and I'll buy that buckle and more belts!
customer_reviews.author: Odysseus

customer_reviews.title: Poor mechanism design
customer_reviews.text: The belt and buckle seem to be well built. The deduction of two stars is for the design of the release mechanism. The mechanism releases the belt with the slightest pressure when adjusting the pants, or even sitting down. I have an older belt from a different vendor where you have to push the release lever back into your waist. This mechanism pulls away from the body, causing the aforementioned problem. This is a daily annoyance and while it’s not a manufacturing defect, it’s a defective design.
customer_reviews.author: Sohail Khwaja

customer_reviews.title: Sharp edges poke holes in my shirts.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality product, but the buckle pokes holes in my shirts. This is a problem common to many mens' belts, and I actually selected this one because it looked round. Unfortunately, this belt buckle is only round at the front--it is very pointy near at the back of the buckle. This buckle actually pokes holes in my shirts much more severely than previous belts. Check your wardrobe--do all your shirts have two pinholes at the bottom?
customer_reviews.author: NAR8789

customer_reviews.title: Great belt for comfort and great company!
customer_reviews.text: Ratcheting belts are awesome! Super comfortable because they adjust to a much finer level than normal belts. I did have an issue with my belt, which I bought in May 2018. A ping that held the buckle on had fallen out, which made the belt nearly unusable. I contacted the company and they immediately sent me a new one, saying that this was no the standard they want from their belts. So, kudos for them for being an awesome company!
customer_reviews.author: Soljia

customer_reviews.title: Great belts
customer_reviews.text: This is my fourth Marino belt, I had trouble with one and right away they sent me a replacement and now that one has worn out so I bought this belt to replace the old one. They are great belts. My only concern and the reason I have them four stars versus five is the release mechanism on the underside of the belt it is stiff and does not always release easily. I would probably not get this belt again because of that. I am hoping that with use the mechanism will work more easily. They are generally great belts. I would recommend them highly to family and friends.
customer_reviews.author: D. Leiter

customer_reviews.title: Nice belt, faulty instructions.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful leather and beautiful buckle. There is a problem with the little instructions card. The last line shows the buckle and simply says "lift to release.". Lift what?, you say. The buckle? No. There is a small lever on the bottom of the buckle. Didn't discover it until after I had trashed the leather trying to release the buckle. Now that I know the layout, it's a nice set-up. You just need to change the instructions to point out the small lever on the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Flaws on leather.
customer_reviews.text: The item looks great in pictures but in person there is a flaw on the leather as seen on my attached picture which shows poor quality control. Very well packaged, nice sealed box! The workmanship is great. The blame should be 100% on quality inspection/control! Im thinking about returning it and would not buy from this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Phi Dinh

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Belt
customer_reviews.text: I hate shopping in Department stores for belts. The choices are limited and the prices are inflated. I ordered this belt to try the new mechanism that eliminates holes in belt. I am so pleased with this belt. It looks like a much more expensive belt and the locking mechanism works great. I lost 5 inches around my waist recently so I took the belt loose from the buckle and trimmed it off the end and put the buckle back on. This is a high quality belt at an exceptionally reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Williams

customer_reviews.title: Better Than Advertised!
customer_reviews.text: I now own three of these. They are terrific. Quality leather, excellent quality buckles. I hate to sound like a zealot, but these belts have literally changed the way I get dressed in the morning. I wear a suit and tie every day, and I no longer have to make sure I get the right belt with the right suit based on the notches in the belt and how well they line up with a particular pair of pants. Just fabulous.
customer_reviews.author: ahs87

customer_reviews.title: I love this brand
customer_reviews.text: I love this brand , the mechanism is great, but this style of unlock is horrible. I have 5 of their belts. All function flawlessly, just the buckle release is horrible. Find a different buckle. I wasted my money on this one, but brand wise, these are the brand to get.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas W

customer_reviews.title: Very nice.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two belts and this one has a little button at the bottom of the buckle that needs to be twisted to release the belt, and I found this a bit inconvenient versus the one that just needs to pull the buckle to release. Very nice and did not return as I wanted something different, but really prefer the other belt. Great product and love the ratchet as it gives me the precise amount of tightness without being too loose or too tight. Great idea..!
customer_reviews.author: Captain

customer_reviews.title: which gives the product a nice air of quality
customer_reviews.text: My husband was duly impressed by the packaging, which gives the product a nice air of quality. Inside was no different. The belt was easy to adjust. He cut it slightly large, put it on, found it was too large, and then cut it down again. The directions for the unlock mechanism were not quite clear, and that took some play to figure out, but he did, and it works well. He hasn't had it long enough to speak to durability, but time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: C. D. Perry

customer_reviews.title: Nice qality
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product. Easy to size and looks really nice. Looking for belts at stores is such a hit or miss proposition. I will buy thes from nw on. Leather is great quality.m Only two minor issues: First the buckle is good quality metal...so much so that it sets of the TSA magnetic detectors at airports...be advise...take off the belt before going through security; Second, the release catch is tricky to learn the first couple of times....make sure you dont need to get you pants off in a hurry the first couple of times you use it!
customer_reviews.author: Phillip K Bonnell

customer_reviews.title: Although he has had it only a couple of days he says it is one of the best belts he has ever had
customer_reviews.text: Saw ad on TV and when I heard friend remark that he thought the belt was clever I ordered it for his Christmas gift. The belt was a big hit, he put it together amd had it on immediately after opening. Although he has had it only a couple of days he says it is one of the best belts he has ever had, it fits perfectly, looks nice and he especially likes that there are no holes.
customer_reviews.author: RICHARD L. GALLOWAY

customer_reviews.title: I am so glad I found it
customer_reviews.text: I never knew of these type of belts. I am so glad I found it. Easy to use. I was going to buy a much more expensive one, but went ahead and purchased a less expensive one (to see how these types of belts actually work in real life). The Marino I got is beautiful, functional and I cannot wait to get another (I have to wait until my regular ones wear out first). As an engineer, I cannot see how the other's cost so much as the Marino works just fine for a much lesser price. I am telling all my friends and will probably get a few as gifts.
customer_reviews.author: PaulG

customer_reviews.title: Very excellent belt
customer_reviews.text: Very excellent for me so far. I have been wearing it daily for several months and is holding up very well. Very well made,easy to trim to size,and you don’t get that crease/damage from a traditional buckle. Also is very well packaged. Highly recommended if you’re looking for a ratchet type belt and at a good and fair price in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Geiger

customer_reviews.title: Classic looking belts with fine size adjustments
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with my purchase so far. Purchased three belts. Two dress and one casual. I like the colors and styling of the belts. Really enjoy the ease of adjustment with the ratchet mechanism. Had an issue with the delivery of one of the dress belts. Not because of the manufacturer. The issue was the package was damaged in transit. The people at Marino that I dealt with were very helpful in resolving the issue, and I received my belt after a short delay. Can't speak right now as to the durability of the belts. I have I had them only a short while. Will update as time goes on.
customer_reviews.author: J.R.

customer_reviews.title: Nice belt- works great looks great !
customer_reviews.text: Hello, this is the second one of these belts I have purchased. I had purchased one in brown, and got this one in black . These belts look good and perform good. they are available in many different buckle styles and colors. You just cut to length and you are good to go. Happy Shopping ! T.S.
customer_reviews.author: T. Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: I've thrown out my other belts.
customer_reviews.text: Now I don't have to choose between a too-tight belt, vs. one that lets my pants fall down, forcing me to pull them up all the time when I'm out and around. It appears very solidly made. No holes to wear out. One tip, not well-explained on the card: when releasing the belt, if it doesn't release easily when you push up on the small release lever, then push the leather slightly into the buckle, as if tightening it, then pull it outwardly, and it releases easily.
customer_reviews.author: PaoliLocal

customer_reviews.title: Unreliable buckle !
customer_reviews.text: It's a good-looking belt and buckle. Seemed like a great idea. However, the buckle is really unreliable. I had to return two of them because the belt suddenly pulls free from the buckle. For some reason, the buckle just won't hold the belt properly. Really disappointing. I wouldn't recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: JustWrite

customer_reviews.title: This belt is absolutely amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This belt is absolutely amazing! I wear it nearly every day! I do admit it takes a little getting used to as the way that you loosen it is by pressing the little button underneath the buckle (you also generally have to pull it tight a little to get the button depressed) but in the long run I believe it will make for a longer lasting belt as you are not constantly pulling the belt the other way to tighten and loosen it. There is definitely much more flexibility with this belt as well with the waist size which I also like.
customer_reviews.author: Marty

customer_reviews.title: Once you use this you’ll never go back to your old belt!
customer_reviews.text: We love these belts! This purchase had an issue where we got a defective belt. I contacted the company and they were very apologetic and sent a replacement of my choice out immediately. It was received within a couple days and has met the quality standards that we have come to expect from this brand. My husband will not wear the old style belts anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Tara Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Almost had to cut it off the first time. The buckle was that difficult to open.
customer_reviews.text: This is the fourth ratchet belt I have purchased, and the first from this company. i am going to have to return it. The buckle mechanism is different from the others I bought and VERY difficult to open. It requires a small latch on the bottom of the buckle to be pushed up, as another belt I have, but I almost have to use a pair of pliers to do it. The leather is very nice looking, but it’s gotta go.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen G. Powell

customer_reviews.title: Buckle doesn't stay tight
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this belt for my husband and he loved it but found the buckle wasn't staying tight. Amazon replaced it for us as he has two others (in blue and black) that aren't having this problem. The replacement one we just received he tells me isn't staying tight either. I'm not sure what the problem is as it's only with the brown ones as the blue and black ones he has aren't having the same issue.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Finkle

customer_reviews.title: Great product! No more folding waistlines.
customer_reviews.text: My biggest issue with belts is always that they never seem to have that "perfect" adjustment. The holes make it so that it's either too large on the waist, or it's too tight and folds the waistline of my slacks. Not any more! This belt adjusts perfectly and looks great. As a side note, I ordered the Mahogany to pair with oxblood oxfords, but this belt isn't quite as red as it appears. Still works and looks great, though.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn fenk

customer_reviews.title: ... adjustable ratchet belt I've purchased and it is the best one yet
customer_reviews.text: This is the 4th adjustable ratchet belt I've purchased and it is the best one yet!!! Features that appeal to me are: a. The handsome design b. The width of the belt is not as wide as the ones I purchased before making it an ideal belt to use for all occasions - for dress and casual purposes c. It comes in a handsome box suitable to be used as a gift. d. Included as an added item with the belt is a nice looking key chain
customer_reviews.author: michiko

customer_reviews.title: The best belt all around for a good value.
customer_reviews.text: These are excellent belts and a great value. I got two of these belts a year ago just to give them a try. They look good and hold up well with regular use. The click belt mechanism works great, is easy to use and I can adjust my belt exactly to the length I want. And, no one can tell it isn't a regular belt. The leather and buckle look like a good quality belt. I have spent far more on other belts and they aren't really any better. Good product.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Harlan

customer_reviews.title: Just Okay
customer_reviews.text: This was for my husband, a dress belt with a quick "buckle". After minimal use over the course of a 1 1/2 yrs, this belt has not performed as expected. At first it was reliable, but now the locking mechanism comes loose whenever he bends over even just a little bit. The finish is wearing off quickly. You're better off finding a belt that fits.
customer_reviews.author: Smith-House

customer_reviews.title: Buckle problems.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this belt as I wanted one that easily adjusted. Had it for several days and like it so much, I ordered one in in brown and mahogany. BUT after wearing the black one for two weeks, the buckle releases for no reason - i.e. defective buckle but can’t return it as I already cut the belt for my size. So far the other buckle has worked fine but haven’t used it as much.
customer_reviews.author: David K. Oliveria

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Color is off from picture, ratchet buckle only locked in place if I manually pushed the catch into place. Belt is difficult to work too. Angle at which it passes through the buckle is odd and not really comfortable. Quality of finishes are sub-par. Find ah peeling after only a couple of days.
customer_reviews.author: Dau

customer_reviews.title: It's perfectly designed and part of a classic wardrobe for dress slacks or jeans. Fantastic product worth twice the money.
customer_reviews.text: unbelievable. I have an engineering degree with a minor in Fine Arts and this masterpiece is something I wish I had found years ago! The styling is subdued, classic, easy, completely adjustable, easy to trim to length, and the perfect width for jeans or dress pants. Exactly what i envisioned when i went searching and just KNEW I would not find...yet here it is. Thank you! Dave Sharp
customer_reviews.author: Dave Sharp

customer_reviews.title: New buckle design is horrible, it doesn't unlatch
customer_reviews.text: The new buckle design has a switch that moves the ratchet tooth out of the way instead of just springloading the ratchet tooth into the buckle. It doesn't work. At all.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: Perfect belt
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband. Now he also has a black one. He said he will never go back to a regular belt again. This belt is always at the exact right spot and no worries about it getting stretched out or having ugly used holes.
customer_reviews.author: tnsgrl

customer_reviews.title: Great belt but their Linxx buckle is better
customer_reviews.text: Not all Marino rachet belt are created equal. I bought this one and another Marino model with the Linxx buckle. The belt material is a little thinner on this model and the buckle design is not quite as user friendly as the Linxx. I give this one a 4 star and the Marino model with the Linxx buckle a 5 star.
customer_reviews.author: Beer Budget

customer_reviews.title: Great belt!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using ratchet belt for a few years. I love them 'cause you can easily adjust them to the size you feel comfortable with. No Need to make holes. No need to move 1 inch. Just a few clicks. I use them for work, 5 days a week and they last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: E. Growell

customer_reviews.title: Elegant, Pristine, Clean Look, Secure Feel
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, LOVE this belt. I'm a big guy and this is the most comfortable, easy on and off belt I have ever worn. No creasing in the leather from the buckle, no extra holes in the belt to dial in fit (holes by the way, that usually look like they where placed there by a deranged 4 year old with machete) Just clean and elegant, proud to own this belt, will be purchasing more to match other suits, jeans, shorts, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Bell

customer_reviews.title: Belts are great.
customer_reviews.text: I love the belt. Very easy to put on and release. Eat too much? No problem with releasing the belt to a comfortable position. The belt was made for it's ease of operation, but it also looks really great. There are so many types of buckles you can chose from. I started out with one belt and now I have three of them.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry K.

customer_reviews.title: Great look and comfortable to wear
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice belt that works well for both business and casual attire. It was very easy to custom size as they mark the back side of the belt with the waist sizes to trim at. The ratchet mechanism is too notch and looks just like a standard buckle.
customer_reviews.author: Houstonnative

customer_reviews.title: Nice concept, executed poorly
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been meaning to write this review for a while now. I bought this belt after a friend recommended it to me. It seemed super convenient and handy, so I bought it. It’s a really nice concept and I love how it looks, but after about 3 months of normal usage, the paint started coming off. I take off the belt super gently but the tooth of the belt keeps rubbing against the cheap paint/leather and it looks terrible now. I bought two and regret doing so.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: hard to releasaiming to pleasee
customer_reviews.text: buckle tends to be hard to release I have bought two from Marino, one broke last one hard to release price good delivery box great for gifting buckle needs improvement. i have others that work great no problems> That was my problem so the company found this out and sent me another to replace it I believe they are aiming to please and have a great prooduct!!!
customer_reviews.author: keith d.

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money.
customer_reviews.text: Idiotic! Trying to be fancy and innovative, this belt doesn't stay locked into place. They have come up with some contraption for a belt buckle that is difficult to operate and doesn't work. No one has really ever built a better mousetrap and these guys have definitely not built a better buckle!
customer_reviews.author: So. Cal. Bill

customer_reviews.title: Not a good product
customer_reviews.text: Great concept and good looking belt, but the Belt itself is not wide as I'd like and the ratchet system often comes loose. Very frustrsting! Not sure if I'm doing something wrong, but anytime there is some pressure oh the Belt the buckle let's loose. Bought two and was going to gift one. Changed my mind and am going to return them.
customer_reviews.author: peter trunk

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality Craftsmanship
customer_reviews.text: This product has an inner cavity the entire length of the belt which makes the durability of this product very weak. The outside of the belt separated within 15 days of having wearing it. The mechanism to release the belt catches when in the full unlock position. I definitely would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Lilley

customer_reviews.title: Innovative design
customer_reviews.text: This is a clever twist on a belt. Doesn’t use a metal rod through a hole rather it uses a latching system that’s hidden on the underside of the belt. I’ve only had the belt for a couple of weeks but I love it. It’s easy to adjust exactly to what I need. I don’t know how long it may last, but I love the function and the fashion without having the hole get stretched out.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Top quality belt!
customer_reviews.text: This is my repeat order for another Mio Marino belt. Can’t thank the seller enough as I find them top-notch and customizable. The buckles are interchangeable. I typically don’t like the ones with prongs/ tongues so these are perfect for me! Will definitely buy more...
customer_reviews.author: raka

customer_reviews.title: How to find the buckle release so you can take your pants off!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful belt and buckle. Instruction card for proper operation was missing from the box. Very frustrating trying to find the buckle release in in order to remove my pants. I finally found the small lever at the bottom of the buckle. Now I like it 5 stars worth.
customer_reviews.author: wayneworld10

customer_reviews.title: Spectacular idea
customer_reviews.text: This things is great, I'm a skinny person and my weight fluctuates quite a bit causing me to regularly be between notches in most belts or even too skinny for the last notch to do any good. Got this, cut it to length and love it. I will definitely be buying more of these in the future.
customer_reviews.author: tubaking182

customer_reviews.title: Great Belt
customer_reviews.text: This is a great belt and one of my favorites. It looks great, and feels even better. The locking gear works smoothly and feels firm with no slippage. This is my second belt. I have had one for over a year with no wear issues. The color has not fades nor has there been any problems with the belt. Great value!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Belt!
customer_reviews.text: Love this Belt! The look is great. The clasp seems to be really strong. I think this will outlive MANY belts I’ve bought over the years. SO easy to make the right size with a simple snip with some strong and sharp scissors
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and kind of fun to use
customer_reviews.text: Easy and quick on and off. The model I selected is simple, sleek ... looks expensive. The only minor downside, is the thickness of the buckle. If you’re looking at it side ways (or if you have a bit of a gut and the buckle is not flat on your stomach) it could seem a little thick. But not a big deal.
customer_reviews.author: Blaise Cozzolino

customer_reviews.title: I like the buckle on this belt much better than the ...
customer_reviews.text: I like the buckle on this belt much better than the first ratchet belt I purchased, from a competing company. I have a little bit of a belly (not too much of one, mind you), and the rounded edge on this buckle is very comfortable compared to the other company's buckle, when I sit down. The only reason i did not give this 5 stars is that the belt is not as heavy duty as the other company's. Overall, I like this a lot!
customer_reviews.author: foxyrich

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding quality and service
customer_reviews.text: This belt is amazing. It is a very high quality construction and works better than expected. I am buying 3 more just like it (different colors of course!). Excellent customer service and top of the line packaging too. ALL AROUND AMAZING!
customer_reviews.author: Scott Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Nice belt with near perfect quality
customer_reviews.text: Nice belt. Nicely packaged. I haven't used it, just tried it. But right after unboxing it I noticed a small detail. Would give 5 stars if it wasn't for a minor detail near the buckle where the leather is loose or pealing off I am afraid that with use the leather will become lose on that part which happens to be one of the most touched / wear'd part of the belt. The belt color, material and buckle design is beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: F. Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Stuck in my Own Belt!
customer_reviews.text: Great looking belt, but the release mechanism doesn't work. Works fine when I'm not wearing it, but 3 times out of four, I have to pull my pants down while the belt is still buckled. Thankfully, I don't wear my belt too tight. Otherwise I would be stuck.
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic belt, but even more fantastic vendor.
customer_reviews.text: Needed a new belt for work and saw this one rated well on Amazon. The mechanism works great, the leather and buckle look fantastic, and I have no complaints. But even more important - the vendor (Marino) is super fantastic to work with. I'm a moron and accidentally cut the belt too short, so it looked awkward with dress pants. They have a slip that comes with the belt saying that miscuts are on them... so I emailed them, and BAM, immediate response and replacement belt. Seriously. I'll be ordering more belts for casual days from them.
customer_reviews.author: avid_amazon_orderer

customer_reviews.title: Belt OK after odor died down
customer_reviews.text: The belt looks nice and the buckle works well. When I received it it had an order like paint thinner so I left it outside for 2 weeks and the odor went down 90%. Then I started to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Traylor

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully packaged, awesome for a gift!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this belt as a gift for my son, I have not given it to him yet, but it seems awesome! The packaging is lovely for a gift and it includes a bonus gift of a key holder inside. I can't wait to give it to him! If you are considering this as a gift, it is perfect! Seller is awesome with reach out communication. I will order more for gifts for the holidays! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: DT

customer_reviews.title: Great Belt
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I've been losing a lot of weight and this helps to have one belt for a decreasing wasteline. Its also great when in between belt holes. Easy to use. Easy to adjust. I have the black and brown colors.
customer_reviews.author: Will the Lawyer

customer_reviews.title: Belt is breaking down within 2.5 months of purchase
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased these ratchet belts in the past from this same company and really liked them, but this belt has started to have a several-inch portion on one side break off to leave a jagged edge. It tends to not slide through my belt loops smoothly now as a result. Maybe the quality has slipped since I bought my other belts? That’s too bad because I like the styling of the buckle.
customer_reviews.author: Trenton L Hickman

customer_reviews.title: Took a great belt and ruined it
customer_reviews.text: Had one of these and loved it. Ordered a new one and they ruined it. The changes the ratchet from the buckle to a hinge that you push from under the buckle. Terrible design that ruined a great belt!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The belt will not stay tight
customer_reviews.text: When I first got this belt I was very happy with the looks of it. I cut the belt to the proper length and tried it on. I noticed that the first half of the track didn't seem to catch at all and then I had to go a little tighter than I wanted it before it caught and held itself in place. Then I breathed and the belt came loose. After a couple more times it held in place while I walked around but when I sit down it just comes loose again. This just makes the belt unusable which is disappointing because it is a nice looking belt.
customer_reviews.author: jason davis

customer_reviews.title: Love at first Site !
customer_reviews.text: Price, quality and design are 5 STARS ! Where have you been all my life - LOL. I tell everyone about this product and all my friends are now ordering . Cannot say enough good things. Highly recommend .
customer_reviews.author: Tra W

customer_reviews.title: I needed to replace a very high quality belt that ...
customer_reviews.text: I needed to replace a very high quality belt that I've had for over 5 years. Thought I'd try this and if it didn't meet expected standard I could always use it for a knock around casual/work belt. While they promote the buckle mechanism, I've been pleasantly surprised with the quality of the leather. I'll be ordering a black belt shortly.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Sykes

customer_reviews.title: Great belt and outstanding customer service
customer_reviews.text: The leather scratches easy and is not what I would consider high quality but is decent. Ratchet works great. Cut the belt at the very least 5" longer than your pants waist size. I would buy it again. Customer service was outstanding as I had an issue they dealt with quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Tanner

customer_reviews.title: make sure you know where the release latch is, before it is too late.
customer_reviews.text: It took me a little time to get used to it. First time wearing it, there was an issue... I did not know/remember how to unlatch the belt while having an emergency! Thankfully it ended on the positive side. I was able to find the release latch and open the belt. Since that time there has been no issues with the belt. It looks great, it works as it is intended. It is a great belt. I will be purchasing another.
customer_reviews.author: Wildcat

customer_reviews.title: Just get it .. it is amazing belt
customer_reviews.text: This belt is amazing my husband bought the same one 3 years ago he wore it daily and its time for a new one can't emphasize how he loves this belt great quality
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Buy this product!!!
customer_reviews.text: I just received the item... I wear pants size 44... this belt is way too short... very bad and misleading advertised... I want to return it This is an update... I received a new belt free of defects. IT IS AWESOME!!! I”ll buy again in different colors. Customer Service Exceded the expected. RECOMMENDED!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kiuci

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Finally, the perfect belt. No need for a long, drawn-out review here. This belt is perfect. The racheting system makes it completely adjustable to your size and works perfectly. It comes packaged very nicely. The leather is supple, yet strong. Some reviews had mentioned issues with the belt "bending" or loosing its shape. Just flip it over.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel L.

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: Looked great and came in a nice box. First time I piut the clamp buckle on it ripped the “leather”. Looked nice but was cheaply made. I returned the next day.
customer_reviews.author: Rex Y

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't latch well
customer_reviews.text: Looks good, but the lever keeps getting pushed just from moving and the patch doesn't hold good at all. Constantly re-tightening the belt and it's super annoying when my pants get loose and start falling down when walking with my hands full.
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and heavy, great for my chore pants.
customer_reviews.text: the belt is sturdy the hidden catches behind the belt click on to sprocket then are released with a release lever. it seems to be adjustable in 3/8 inch increments. the belt must be cut to length then the cut end is inserted in to the buckle. The whole thing is high quality and a little heavy with a solid thick buckle. I use this belt for my construction contractor work pants. It can take the every day strains.
customer_reviews.author: Stan Hope

customer_reviews.title: Nice Belt, Great Buckle
customer_reviews.text: Very nice belt. The leather is high quality and the buckle is smooth and doesn't snag my clothes. I've had a hard time finding a belt with a smooth-enough that it won't punch holes in some of my lighter-weight tops. So far, this buckle seems to be perfect. Took a second to get the rhythm of the latch at the bottom to unlock it, but it's pretty straightforward. Also, it came with a nice leather key ring as a bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Wanttaja

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Good looking belt, but the ratchets are not deep and belt will loosen up. Had to return to the first belt as the leather had some defects. Color was not quite as described.
customer_reviews.author: Frank J.

customer_reviews.title: Won't stay latched
customer_reviews.text: Bought it because it was going to be more adjustable. It adjusts itself alright. It comes unlatched ever 15-30 seconds. Sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher D. Fox

customer_reviews.title: Belt release
customer_reviews.text: Belt looks nice. Would rather full buckle bout is OK. A little hard to undo belt as comparted to other belts I have like this. Others have full buckle and just pull on it to release. This has a small release which is a little harder to get to release belt.
customer_reviews.author: Gretnatiger

customer_reviews.title: This belt is absolutely amazing, it’s easy on off with the push of ...
customer_reviews.text: This belt is absolutely amazing, it’s easy on off with the push of a button hidden behind the belt buckle itself, it looks clean due to the fact of no belt holes notches, out of all my dress belts this one is my favorite. The one and only complaint I have about this belt, is the color of the actual belt is not exact. But I’ll definitely be purchasing more of these belts in different colors.
customer_reviews.author: jay Pendley

customer_reviews.title: Great idea!
customer_reviews.text: Like the ratchet belts. Getting old brings some changes, there are currencies that necessitate getting your pants down quick! In those moments I'm thankful for my rachet belt!
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my husband for Christmas. He loves it and wears it nearby everyday. It's his go to belt. Easy to adjust and he loves the closing mechanism. I will be buying him many more styles and colors from this brand. Also arrived in a very nice box--appeared top of the line.
customer_reviews.author: M. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Great Looking - Genius Design/Function
customer_reviews.text: Great belt with easy “infinite” adjustment that stays solidly in place. Length marks embossed on back of belt for perfect ease in trimming length to size shows the thought and genius that went in to design of these belts. Highly recommend to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Frank T. Lane

customer_reviews.title: I love this belt
customer_reviews.text: I love this belt! Especially during the holidays when waistlines change ever so slightly and the standard belt holes just don't give enough variety to accommodate. I was beyond pleased with the stylish look of the belt, particularly when considering the price. I have more expensive belts that are not as stylish as my new Marino belt. I only wish they had more colors to choose from. If they did, I'd replace all of my belts!
customer_reviews.author: JN

customer_reviews.title: Love the Ratchet Design, However...
customer_reviews.text: A great buckle design. With it's ratchet system, all one has to do is pull the end of the belt to the tightness desired without having to align with any spaced holes. That being said with a five star rating in January 1917, I now give it two stars as the ratchet no longer holds after only 21 months. Well. , back to my old prong in a hole belt.
customer_reviews.author: Olde Guy

customer_reviews.title: This belt type is so much more comfortable than the preset holes on traditional belts
customer_reviews.text: I switched to using the ratchet style belt a little over a year ago and it is a huge life-changer. I'm surprised this wasn't "invented' until the last few years. This belt type is so much more comfortable than the preset holes on traditional belts. It allows for slight/minor adjustments when needed (i.e. after a big meal, haha) instead of too tight or too big. It's also more convenient to put on and take off. If you have been considering switching, DO IT. You won't regret it. As far as this specific brand/seller, I had zero issues and the belt looks fantastic both as a casual and professional attire accessory.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren McAfee

customer_reviews.title: Best belt there is.
customer_reviews.text: These style belts are the best thing since sliced bread. This brand adds the peanut butter. You will never go back to traditional belts and you can’t beat the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Well done, all
customer_reviews.text: I just bought these for my Dad, after having tried one for myself. Dad is always unsure how to adjust his belt, and this allows for a very simple, complete solution.
customer_reviews.author: BHWIII

customer_reviews.title: my favorite belt, MAKE SURE you know how to undo ...
customer_reviews.text: my favorite belt, MAKE SURE you know how to undo the before you put it on. clasp on the bottom pulls upwards. I stupidly put in on without looking at it and kept tightening it on accident until I was in pain and was about to just cut it off of me. After i figured it out it really is amazing.lmao
customer_reviews.author: Justin Ugner

customer_reviews.title: Nice belt! I like that you can easily make ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice belt! I like that you can easily make adjustments without taking belt off and that you can make the fit more accurate to begin with. It's easy to attach the buckle- if you know what to do! In looking at the buckle I made it out to be much more complicated than it was- the printed directions/illustrations could make the process clearer. The cut end (you cut the belt at the inch marks they have on the inside for your waist size) goes into the small hinged part that has teeth- and then you just clamp those teeth down on that cut end.
customer_reviews.author: wchip

customer_reviews.title: Stylish but cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: Does not mechanically function as well as other equally price ratchet belts I have. Loosening it even a notch will get the mechanism stuck and youll have to pull out the whole belt to unstick it. Defeating the whole convenience of having a ratchet belt. Look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it and the ratchet system is great
customer_reviews.text: Love it and the ratchet system is great, why would you ever need a standard belt, no more fussing around with belt loop holes--I never return to the standard belt again after experiencing the simplicity of these belts, If there was a 6 star system, I'll give these belts and customer service 7 STARS!!
customer_reviews.author: James H.

customer_reviews.title: Quality Belt
customer_reviews.text: I have just had the belts for about 2 weeks. What I noticed about these belts compared to other ratchet belts that I have ordered is the packaging and the quality of the leather. The leather seems to be a step about the others, its soft to the touch and playable. Additionally the package is quite nice.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Love this products and company
customer_reviews.text: Love this products and company. Tired of unslightly holes in belts. This is the answer. The company was constantly providing me help as I never used a ratchet belt before. Superb customer service and product.
customer_reviews.author: Irwin Forman

customer_reviews.title: A little uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: Clever design. Great styling. Only problem I encountered is with the buckle. Unless you have a low percent body fat, the buckle can leave an unpleasant gouge in your waist when you sit.
customer_reviews.author: Grey Seal

customer_reviews.title: Color is nothing like the picture they show
customer_reviews.text: I would give this belt 5 stars, it's really well made and the system is quite good, but both the color of the leather and the buckle I received are different as the picture they advertise as you can see in the picture I post.
customer_reviews.author: Rogelio Toledo Davalos

product_meta.title: Mio Marino Ratchet Belts for Men - Genuine Leather Dress Belt - Automatic Buckle
feature_bullets: NO MORE HOLES - Marino's leather belt provides 38 unique adjustments for an extremely comfortable fit. Easy removable buckle allows you to cut the ratchet belt to your ideal size to give a primmer and custom-tailored appearance!

MAXIMUM DURABILITY - Strap is a bit wider than 1 and an 1/8" presenting the perfect look of a fine, genuine leather quality designer belt for men, complemented with a HIGHLY FASHIONABLE stylish and interchangeable buckle that is elegantly designed with class. Scratch resistant durable buckles are designed to keep your Marino style going for a long while!

EASY USE - Just slide the dress belt into the sliding buckle and pull the ratchet belt strap through, the buckle simply locks. To release the automatic belt, gently push the lever on the side of removable buckle and lock will snap. Simple, smooth and sleek!
GIFT BOX - Make a big impression! Marino belts with removable buckles are enclosed in a lovely, attractive gift box.
ORDER WITH GRACE - 100% satisfaction guaranteed, 45 days free exchange and returns plus 180 days warranty.
